page.title: 12Visit West Bromwich Hospital
page.content:
We left school at 2.30pm and we arrived at the hospital at 2.45pm. As soon as we got there Miss Turton, the hospital secretary was waiting for us. She was very pleasant, big and had blonde hair. She had on a blue nurse's dress and a white frilly hat. The hospital is very large and there are a lot of wards and the wards are kept very clean and tidy. All the nurses in the hospital were very pleasant and kind to us. Also they had the same uniform on if they were staff nurses. All the nurses had different duties but while we were there, there was an emergency. All the nurses and doctors were rushing up and down the corridor with different equipment.
Jackie Lloyd 13
